translation.en: Family is everything, no?
translation.zh: 家庭就是一切 不是吗？

translation.en: Now, do you love your son?
translation.zh: 现在 你爱你的儿子吗？

translation.en: Now, do you understand?
translation.zh: 现在你懂我的意思了吧？

translation.en: You have a $10 million insurance policy. I know that.
translation.zh: 我知道你有保额为一千万的保险

translation.en: Follow these instructions...
...or God be with your child.
translation.zh: 不然你儿子很快就会去见上帝

translation.en: You will remove your shirt... ...and hold it out the window to ID the car.
translation.zh: 脱下你的衬衫 拿出车窗外作为标记

translation.en: Be professional.
Come alone.
Georgina! Obey me. I will love you. Come on.
translation.zh: 乔吉娜！ 听话我就会爱你

translation.en: - That's how it works, huh? - That's right.
translation.zh: -女人就吃这套 不是吗？ -没错

translation.en: She got a sister?
How's business?
The Japanese are here in a big way.
Cheap labor, factory space, but they feel a lot safer living over the border in El Paso.
translation.zh: 廉价劳工 工厂大 但是 他们觉得厄尔巴索那边较安全

translation.en: I ferry them back and forth. They think I'm John Wayne.
translation.zh: 来回接送 把我当约翰 韦恩

translation.en: - I live like a king down here. - Yes, you do.
translation.zh: -我住在这里像个国王 -看得出来

translation.en: - You been working? - Yeah. No.
No. I've been moving around. You know. Colombia, a couple of places I can't name.
translation.zh: -有工作吗？ -有 没有 跑了一些地方 哥伦比亚 几个不知名的地方

translation.en: Nothing catches my fancy.
You think God'll forgive us for what we've done?
translation.zh: -上帝会原谅我们做过的事吗？ -我不认为

translation.en: - No. - You don't?
translation.zh: -上帝会原谅我们做过的事吗？ -我不认为 你不认为吗？ 我也不认为

translation.en: Me either.
translation.zh: 你不认为吗？ 我也不认为

translation.en: - How long you staying? - I don't know, I just, you know...
I wanted to see you, Ray, see how you're doing.
I just came by on impulse.
I could do with some impulse.
translation.zh: 我也常一时兴起就行动

translation.en: What happened?
Family paid the ransom, then they sent the kid home after a couple of days.
translation.zh: 他们家付了赎金 几天后孩子就回来了

translation.en: Minus an ear, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 少了一只耳朵

translation.en: Now every mother in Mexico City with money wants bigger bodyguards.
translation.zh: 现在墨西哥城每个妈妈都想找 高大的保镖 包括我太太

translation.en: - My own wife included. - I hate to break it to you, but she's right.
translation.zh: 现在墨西哥城每个妈妈都想找 高大的保镖 包括我太太 我不想这么说但是她是对的

translation.en: She's right.
translation.zh: 我不想这么说但是她是对的

translation.en: Look, Sammy, all my clients have kidnap and ransom insurance.
translation.zh: 山缪 我的客户都投了绑架和赎金险

translation.en: I have a policy. AIG. My dad gave it to me.
translation.zh: 我父亲为我买了美亚的保险

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I got it for your dad.
translation.zh: 我知道 我为你父亲办的

translation.en: But what'll you do in 60 days when you can't renew it because you have no bodyguard?
translation.zh: 但60天后若没有保镖 不得续保 你怎么办？

translation.en: I know. I had to let Emilio go.
translation.zh: 我不得不解雇艾密里欧

translation.en: Well, you gotta please Lisa. I mean, ass like that's hard to find.
translation.zh: 你得讨好丽莎 这种尤物很难找到

translation.en: Look.
A bodyguard's like anything else. You get what you pay for, okay?
translation.zh: 保镖一样是一分钱一分货

translation.en: You could do this. Get one that's got a decent résumé.
translation.zh: 有不错简历就行 又不是找超人

translation.en: We're not looking for goddamn Superman, right? Get someone cheap.
translation.zh: 有不错简历就行 又不是找超人 先找个便宜的

translation.en: So you renew the policy, and then fire the prick for whatever, incompetence.
translation.zh: 搞定续保 然后 找理由开除他 能力不足

translation.en: All kidding aside, the most important thing is that your daughter goes back to school,
translation.zh: 最主要的是让女儿能继续上学

translation.en: and that your wife gets to save face.
This way you won't be the only unprotected family in the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 不要做邻里唯一没保护的家庭

translation.en: That's right, a bodyguard. Your Spanish is good enough.
translation.zh: 当保镖不错 你西班牙语不错

translation.en: - You're crazy. - You even look the part.
In my state, I couldn't guard a corpse.
It's rich guys flashing their cash. It's all for show. Nothing's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 那是有钱人的炫耀花招 不会真有事的

translation.en: Yeah? You think they'd hire a drunk, a has-been?
translation.zh: 他们愿意雇过气的酒鬼？

translation.en: You have to keep it under control.
What if there was, you know... Just, say, a kidnapping attempt? What do I do then?
translation.zh: 万一有人想绑架 我怎么办？

translation.en: You do your best. They're not gonna be paying you enough to perform miracles.
translation.zh: -尽力而为 没必要上演奇迹 -没必要

translation.en: It's not exactly a scam, Crease. Even at half speed, you're pretty damn good.
translation.zh: 这也不全都是骗人的 你用五成功力就很厉害了

translation.en: Yeah. A bodyguard's gotta be close to people, though. They talk all the time. You know I'm no good at that.
translation.zh: 保镖跟雇主要很亲近 经常要谈话 这我不行

translation.en: You'll be the silent type. They're gonna appreciate that.
translation.zh: 你是沉默型 人们喜欢这种

translation.en: Bodyguard. So who's the guy?
Samuel Ramos. He's a young guy.
translation.zh: 山缪雷墨 一个年轻人

translation.en: - He owns one of the plants in Juárez. - Yeah?
The Jap car industry is in the toilet. He's trying to persuade Ford to partner with him.
translation.zh: 日本汽车工业陷入泥沼 他正想说服福特汽车入股

translation.en: I think he's in trouble. His family lives in Mexico City.
translation.zh: 财务上有困难 家住墨西哥市

translation.en: He asked me if I knew anybody he could trust.
translation.zh: 问我有没有信得过的人

translation.en: - And you thought of me? - Yeah.
Take a job, Crease. Breathe some air. Then decide if you want to stick around.
translation.zh: 克里西 找个工作 放松一阵 再决定留不留下来

translation.en: Besides, I'm glad to see you, you know? I got nobody to talk to down here.
translation.zh: 而且 我很高兴你来 在这儿我没人可说话

translation.en: Listen, my wife wants someone presentable and polite.
translation.zh: 我太太希望找个彬彬有礼的人

translation.en: You'll be the fifth candidate she sees this week.
translation.zh: 你是她这周面试的第五个人

translation.en: Your résumé's quite impressive.
Sixteen years of military experience, extensive counter-terrorism work.
I'm surprised anybody could afford you. What's the catch?
translation.zh: 怎么肯屈就 有什么隐情吗？

translation.en: I drink.
How does that affect you?
Coordination, reaction time.
If top professionals try to kidnap your daughter, I'll do the best I can,
translation.zh: 如果你女儿遭高手绑架 我会尽力

translation.en: but the service will be on a par with the pay.
What if amateurs try it?
I'd probably kill them. Is that likely?
translation.zh: 我会杀了他 有业余的吗？

translation.en: No.
No one is to know about your drinking. That includes my wife.
translation.zh: 喝酒问题我太太不需知道

translation.en: Lisa!
My wife Lisa. And this is John Creasy.
translation.zh: 我太太丽莎 约翰 克里西

translation.en: - You're an American. - So are you.
It's all in there.
- Would you like a drink? - Yes. Jack and water would be good.
translation.zh: -喝杯酒吗？ -好 威士忌加水就可以

translation.en: Have you done much of this kind of work before? No, ma'am.
translation.zh: -以前做过这种工作吗？ -没有 夫人

translation.en: But he has a lot of experience in related fields.
- Do you have a family, Mr. Creasy? - No.
Pita? Pita.
- Yes, Mom? - Honey, this is Mr. Creasy.
translation.zh: -妈 什么事？ -这是克里西先生

translation.en: It's English, honey. Do you wanna show Mr. Creasy to his room?
translation.zh: 说英语 琵塔 带克里西先生去他房间好吗？

translation.en: - This way, Mr. Creasy. - Okay.
translation.zh: 这边请 克里西先生

translation.en: Thank you.
Just like that?
I think it's nice that he's an American.
translation.zh: 我觉得他不错 而且他是美国人

translation.en: I think it's terrific. Are you sure?
translation.zh: 我觉得很合适 确定了？

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you.
I feel better now.
That's Bruno, the gardener. And that's Maria, the cook.
translation.zh: 他是园丁布鲁诺 厨师玛丽亚

translation.en: We fixed the room up two weeks ago. It's nicer than before.
translation.zh: 两周前刚装修过 比以前好

translation.en: You've got a TV and a CD player. What kind of music do you like, Mr. Creasy?

translation.en: - I don't know. - You don't know?
I don't know.
That's Bird. Emilio forgot to take him when he left.
translation.zh: 他名字叫小鸟 艾密里欧离开时忘了带走

translation.en: Emilio was my last bodyguard.
Have you protected a lot of children before, Mr. Creasy?
translation.zh: 你保护过很多小朋友吗 克里西先生？

translation.en: Creasy. You can call me Creasy. And no, you're the first.
translation.zh: 克里西 叫我克里西就可以 你是第一个

translation.en: Bye, Creasy.
Bye, Bird.
- School tomorrow, Peeps. - Does that mean we can get a dog?
translation.zh: -明天要回去上课啰 琵琵 -我们可以养狗吗？

translation.en: Dad promised me one when I went back to school. Yeah, we'll see.
translation.zh: -爸爸答应我我上学去就让我养狗 -我们会考虑的

translation.en: If you get a dog, will you give up your bear? You're getting too old for him.
translation.zh: 如果养狗 你可以不抱小熊吗？ 你已经长大了

translation.en: - How did you like Mr. Creasy? - Creasy. He said to call him just Creasy.
translation.zh: -你喜欢克里西先生吗？ -他说叫他克里西就可以了

translation.en: - That isn't disrespectful, is it? - No, not if he asked you.
translation.zh: -那样不会不礼貌吧？ -他说可以就不会

translation.en: Here. There you go.
He's like a bear too.
- Yeah? - A big, sad bear.
translation.zh: -他长得像一头熊 -是吗？ 忧郁的大熊

translation.en: - Is he sad? - I think. Or something.
translation.zh: -他忧郁吗？ -我觉得啦 类似的感觉

translation.en: Good night, honey.
Can you get me some floss in the morning? - Floss? - Yeah, the strawberry kind.
Sure.
Good night, Bear.
Creasy Bear.
- What's that one for? - La Virgen de Guadalupe.
Business. For Toyota, for Ford.
translation.zh: 保佑事业顺利 祝福丰田 祝福福特

translation.en: If one dies, maybe she can resurrect the other one. I don't know.
translation.zh: 如果一家倒闭 她可能会挽救其他的

translation.en: She likes him.
- What are you talking about? - Creasy.
Pita likes him.
Pita loves school. Pita would love Count Dracula if he took her back there, honey.

translation.en: Okay?
Hey. Are you okay?
- I don't know. - Okay?
I don't know, Lisa. I'm trying.

translation.en: Come on, Bird.
That's right, that's right. Come on.
All right.
Home to Emilio.
You're home free, baby.
translation.zh: 你可以回家了 宝贝儿

translation.en: - Where are you from, Creasy? - The U.S.
translation.zh: -你家住哪里 克里西？ -美国

translation.en: - I know, but which state? - No state in particular.
- You can drive and talk at the same time. - No, I can't, so please let me do my job.
translation.zh: -开车时你也可以讲话 -不行 让我专心工作

translation.en: Are you going to stay?
My last bodyguard left. Somebody gave him more money than we could.
translation.zh: 前一位保镖离开了 因为别人出更高的薪水

translation.en: I guess that makes me a bargain, then, huh?
Being black. Is that a positive or a negative for a bodyguard in Mexico?

translation.en: Time will tell.
There were 24 kidnappings in Mexico City in the last six days.
translation.zh: 墨西哥市过去6天发生 24起绑架案 一天4起

translation.en: - Four a day. - Yeah? Twenty-four?
translation.zh: 墨西哥市过去6天发生 24起绑架案 一天4起 -真的？ 24起？ -你有何感想？

translation.en: - Twenty-four. What do you think? - I think you know more than you should.
translation.zh: -真的？ 24起？ -你有何感想？ -你知道得太多了 -谢谢

translation.en: Well, thank you.
- See you later. - You have to sign.
- What? - You have to sign in. Show them your ID.

translation.en: Come on.
Right there.
Pita! It's so good to have you back.
Sister Anna, this is my new bodyguard, Creasy.

translation.en: - Sister Anna, the headmistress. - Señor Creasy.

translation.en: - Hurry. Class is about to begin. Go, go. - Bye, Creasy.

translation.en: You must look after our Pita. It is not good that she is late today.

translation.en: I'm very sorry. I have to get used to the routes. It won't happen again.

translation.en: No offense, but I regret that your profession needs to exist.

translation.en: So do I, Madre, so do I.
translation.zh: 当然 修女 我也这么想

translation.en: Do you ever see the hand of God in what you do?

translation.en: No, not for a long time.
The Bible says, "Be not overcome of evil..."
"But overcome evil with good."
That's Romans Chapter 12 Verse 21.
I am the sheep that got lost, Madre.
translation.zh: 我是迷途的羔羊 修女

translation.en: When you were a kid, Creasy, did you like school?
translation.zh: -你小时候喜欢上学吗？ -我不记得了

translation.en: - I don't remember. - You don't remember?
translation.zh: -你小时候喜欢上学吗？ -我不记得了 -不记得？ -不记得

translation.en: No, I don't remember. No, I didn't like it.
translation.zh: -不记得？ -不记得 -呃 我不喜欢 -为什么？

translation.en: Why not?
Because it wasn't a school like yours, Pita. There was no Sister Anna.
translation.zh: 学校不一样 没有安娜修女

translation.en: Were you unhappy?
Being unhappy, that's a state of mind. I really don't remember.
translation.zh: 不开心是心理状态 我真的忘了

translation.en: What happened to your hand?
- It's a birth defect. - No, it's not.
Look, no more questions, okay?
- It really wasn't a question. - It sounded like a question to me.
translation.zh: -这不算问问题 -我听起来是 我正在执行我的工作

translation.en: Listen to me. I'm being paid to protect you.
translation.zh: 听好 我领薪水保护你

translation.en: I'm being paid to be your bodyguard. Look at me.
translation.zh: 我受雇当你的保镖 看着我

translation.en: I'm not being paid to be your friend, but to protect you. So no more questions, period.
translation.zh: 我不是受雇当你的朋友 所以不要再问问题 清楚吧

translation.en: - Do you hear me? - Yes.
- No crying. - I'm not crying.
Well, don't start.
You gotta understand, this is a job. In order for me to do my job...
translation.zh: 这是我的工作 为了工作…

translation.en: Wait a minute.
Yeah, come in.
Mr. Creasy.
I just wanted to make sure you have everything you need. I'm fine, thanks.
translation.zh: -还需要些什么吗？ -什么都有了 谢谢

translation.en: Is the food all right? Because Maria told me you didn't eat.
translation.zh: 食物还好吗？玛丽亚说你没吃

translation.en: Yeah, the food is great. I just wasn't that hungry tonight.
translation.zh: 食物很好 我只是今晚不饿

translation.en: So you read the Bible?
Yeah, sometimes.
Does it help? Yeah, sometimes.
- Can I talk to you for a minute? - Sure.
How are you doing with Pita?
Fine.
As soon as she figures out that I'm not her new toy, it'll be fine.
translation.zh: 只要她搞清楚 我不是她的新玩具就会没事

translation.en: - She told me about that. - Okay.
- You don't have children, do you? - I told you I didn't.
Well, they can be tenacious when they want something. And Pita just wants to be friends.
translation.zh: 当他们想要得到什么时 他们很难缠 琵塔就想当你的朋友

translation.en: Okay. But you're paying me to protect her, not to be her friend, right?
translation.zh: 嗯 但我是受雇当保镖 不是当朋友 对吧

translation.en: So...
Look, maybe this isn't gonna work out.
Maybe your husband should find somebody that's a little more sociable.
translation.zh: 你可能该找交际手腕好一点的

translation.en: No, you're right.
You're being paid to protect her.
And I'm confident that you'll do that.
I'll be coming with you tomorrow. I hope that's all right.
translation.zh: 明天我们一起出门 可以吧

translation.en: You think God'll forgive us for what we've done?
translation.zh: 上帝会原谅我们做过的事吗？

translation.en: I'm tired of killing, Ray. I'm tired of killing, Ray.
translation.zh: 我不想再杀人了 雷

translation.en: You think God'll forgive us for what we've done?
translation.zh: 上帝会原谅我们做过的事吗？

translation.en: In my state, I couldn't... I couldn't guard a corpse.
translation.zh: 以我的状况 连尸体都保护不了

translation.en: They talk all the time.
You know I'm no good at that.
You know how they say...
a bullet always tells the truth?
Yeah?
- Hey. - Crease.
translation.zh: -喂 -嘿 克里西 你怎么啦？

translation.en: What's wrong?
Hey, listen, you ever have a 9mm round that didn't go off?
translation.zh: 你有没有… 碰到9毫米手枪子弹不击发？

translation.en: Yeah. Failure to fire.
I know, failure to fire and...
You know, I pulled the trigger and click, nothing.
translation.zh: 扣下板机 但是… 打不出去

translation.en: - You're talking about a bad primer. - Yeah, yeah, but I...
Yeah, right. Dimple on the primer. That may be...
Well, like we used to say...
a bullet always tells the truth.
Crease? You all right?
Yeah.
What were you shooting at?
Yeah, I'm sorry, Ray. I'm sorry I woke you.
translation.zh: 抱歉 雷 把你吵醒

translation.en: No, it's okay, it's nothing. I was watching TV.
translation.zh: 没关系 我在看电视

translation.en: Okay.
Pita, you have a pencil?
Thank you.
- It's hard to get used to the traffic here. - Yeah. I'm very sorry.
translation.zh: -这里的交通很难适应 -非常抱歉

translation.en: - See you, baby. - See you later.
- Hey, don't forget your towel. - Thank you.
Bye.
- You're a strong swimmer. - I never win.
Thanks.
So, what do I do?
You're the fastest in the water, the slowest off the blocks. What do you think that means? What you gotta do?
translation.zh: 你游得最快 跳水最慢 所以你认为呢？

translation.en: - Get faster off the blocks? - Get faster off the blocks.
- Our big swim meet is in three weeks. - Yeah?
- I was gonna enter the 150 freestyle. - You'll be fine. You'll be okay.
translation.zh: -我想参加150米自由式 -你不会有问题的

translation.en: - I'll still be slow. - You're not slow.

translation.en: - I never finish better than third. - Then maybe you are slow.
translation.zh: -没进过前三名 -那就算你慢吧

translation.en: With us this evening we have Mariana Guerrero from Reforma newspaper
translation.zh: 今晚我们邀请到《改革日报》

translation.en: to speak with us about the kidnappings.
translation.zh: 玛丽安娜跟我们谈绑架事件

translation.en: Who are the ones responsible for the kidnappings in Mexico?
translation.zh: 谁该为墨西哥绑架事件负责？

translation.en: It is an activity of organized crime. It's not a random kidnapping.
translation.zh: 这是组织犯罪不是偶发事件

translation.en: They are not political kidnappings like in Colombia.
translation.zh: 但不是哥伦比亚那种政治绑架

translation.en: How do you think he got out?
I let him go.
- It's better to be free, right? - It's better for him.
translation.zh: -自由比较好 对吗？ -对它比较好

translation.en: Actually, he was driving me crazy.
Good night.
Good night.
- See you in a couple of days. I love you. - Love you.
translation.zh: -我们很快回来 我爱你 -爱你

translation.en: Be good. Come on, Lise.

translation.en: All right, sweetheart, so we'll call you from Detroit, okay?

translation.en: - I love you. - Love you.
translation.zh: -我爱你 -爱你 -再见 宝贝！ -再见

translation.en: - Okay, bye, honey. I love you! - Love you.
translation.zh: -再见 宝贝 我爱你！ -我爱你！ 我爱你！

translation.en: I hate leaving her.
Concentrating?
Eyes are closed?
- What happened? - I flinched.
The gunshot holds no fear. Say it.
translation.zh: 你怕 枪声不可怕 说出来

translation.en: - The gunshot holds no fear. - The gunshot holds no fear! Say it!

translation.en: Help me do what?
You're gonna help me do what?
- You're a stranger here, no? - That's right.
You're going to need friends that know their way around.
Okay.
Okay, friend that's gonna help me.
Pleasure to meet you.
Tell your driver to keep his distance next time. All right, friend?
translation.zh: 下次叫你的司机保持距离

translation.en: - You'll be Stateside by supper time. - I'm gonna need some help first, though.
translation.zh: -到美国只要一会儿工夫 -你得先帮我忙

translation.en: You don't stop bleeding, you won't last a day in your shape.
translation.zh: 再这样流血你撑不了一天

translation.en: - Is that a yes or is that a no? - Yeah! But...
translation.zh: -你到底帮不帮？ -帮！但我说过不杀人

translation.en: - I'm done killing. I told you that. - Okay.
translation.zh: -你到底帮不帮？ -帮！但我说过不杀人 -好吧 -其他事我绝不推辞

translation.en: Anything else is yours.
- You're talking about war, Crease. - Exactly. Can you help me?
translation.zh: -你准备打仗不成？ -没错 可以帮忙吗？

translation.en: - Yeah. - Good.
Creasy?
What are you doing here?
I came to get my stuff.
Couldn't find my Bible. I thought it might be in here.
translation.zh: 圣经不见了 应该在这儿

translation.en: - I borrowed it. - Okay.
It's crazy, huh?
One week we're figuring out which nightclub to go to, and the next thing I'm... reading the Bible.
translation.zh: 上周还在想要去哪家具乐部 隔周却开始读圣经了

translation.en: It's a good thing. You hold on to it.
translation.zh: 不错啊 应该继续读

translation.en: I keep thinking if only we hadn't...
translation.zh: 我一直在想如果我们没有…

translation.en: It's like...
My whole life all I've ever thought about was what I could get for myself.
translation.zh: 一辈子烦恼自己能得到什么

translation.en: Not my own baby.
She needed me so much, and sometimes I felt like I had nothing to give her.
translation.zh: 那么需要我 有时候 我觉得没有东西给她

translation.en: Just... I don't know what to do.
- What are you gonna do? - What I do best.
translation.zh: -你会怎么办？ -做我最拿手的事

translation.en: I'm gonna kill them.
Anyone involved, who profited from it, anybody who opens their eyes at me.
translation.zh: 任何有关的人 获利的人 任何敢看我的人

translation.en: You kill them all.
Yeah, it's me.
- Mr. Creasy. - I need the license... No, excuse me.
translation.zh: 克利西先生 我要查个车牌 不 对不起

translation.en: I need the name and address of someone whose license number is C5TK8.
translation.zh: 是姓名地址 车号是 C5TK8

translation.en: That's C5TK8.
I got everything but the last digit, so I need ten possible matches.
translation.zh: 缺最后一码 要查十辆

translation.en: And when do I find out which of the ten it is?
translation.zh: -怎么知道哪辆是正确的？ -总会找到

translation.en: - Eventually. - But where do I reach you?
translation.zh: -怎么知道哪辆是正确的？ -总会找到 -到哪里去找你？ -我会打电话来

translation.en: I'll call you.
translation.zh: -到哪里去找你？ -我会打电话来

translation.en: Do you know who he is?
Do you know what he's been doing the last 16 years?
Counter-insurgency work in Thailand,
Pakistan...
Jordan, Angola, Lebanon. Yes, I know all of that.
translation.zh: 约旦 安哥拉 黎巴嫩等国 我知道

translation.en: He's an assassin...
and you want to help him identify the owner of a car for him?
He can go places we can't.
If you don't want to use him... I will.
When do I get to sleep with you again?
We never sleep. We fuck.
Give it to me.
Give it to me.
Jorge González.
I'm a Judicial Policeman.
Drive. Okay.
What are you gonna do?
What I do best.
Anyone involved, who profited from it, anybody who opens their eyes at me.
translation.zh: 任何有关的人 获利的人 任何敢看我的人

translation.en: I'm gonna kill them.
Can you hear me?
My head hurts.
I am going to ask questions.
If you don't answer fully and truthfully,
you will suffer much more than you have to.
I'm going to cut your fingers off.
translation.zh: 我会把你的手指一根一根

translation.en: One by one, if I have to.
translation.zh: 切下来 如果有必要的话

translation.en: This is to stop the bleeding.
Don't mess with me.
You know who I am?
A member of La Hermandad.
- Correct. - Okay.
What do you want to know?
The Ramos kidnapping...
What went wrong at the drop?
We were just ordered to take her.
That's all we did.
Ordered by who?
I don't know.
You don't know?
We work in separate groups.
A voice calls.
We grab the target
and deliver it to the guardians.
The bosses never see the target,
they just make the deal.
Who ordered it?
We call him "The Voice."
"The Voice." Okay.
"The Voice."
The Voice. How do I find him?
You don't know?
Are you sure?
Okay.
I believe you.
Tell me about the guardians.
I'm a professional.
I'm a professional. I just do my job.
translation.zh: 我是专业的 只是听命行事

translation.en: Tell me about the guardians.
You don't know?
I don't know.
He works the door at a rave in Neza.
translation.zh: 他在奈沙雷鬼舞厅当门房

translation.en: He has a mark
on the left side of his face.
They call him "The Butcher."
Is he La Hermandad?
Yes, La Hermandad.
Okay.
Wait, wait, wait.
Give me one cigarette, please, eh?
Okay.
Okay, my friend.
It's off to the next life for you.
I guarantee you won't be lonely.
translation.zh: 但我保证你路上不会寂寞

translation.en: Revenge is a meal best served cold.
translation.zh: 复仇这道菜越冷越够味

translation.en: Tell me about the girl.
I don't know her.
Okay, okay. Don't shoot. Don't shoot.
Tell me about the girl.
Do you know her?
Hey, man, I heard you speaking Spanish over there. You're American, right?
translation.zh: 我听到你说西语 美国人吗？

translation.en: - And so are you. - Yeah.
- Get outta here. Where you from? - New Jersey.
New Jersey? I'm from New Jersey.
All right, listen to me.
Tell me how it works. The whole thing. Tell me how it works.
translation.zh: 告诉我整个绑架案怎么进行

translation.en: All right, everything is done by cellphone.
You just wait around for calls. We don't even have a fucking number.
translation.zh: 等电话行动 连自己的号码都不知道

translation.en: - Who pays you? - We got an ATM card.
translation.zh: -谁付给你钱 -我们有张银行卡

translation.en: We take out 200 fucking measly dollars every two weeks.
translation.zh: 两个礼拜才区区200元 （银行卡）

translation.en: - Two hundred dollars? - Yeah.
- Okay. What's the PIN number? - The what?
The PIN number, code number.
- You wouldn't lie to me? - I'm not lying.
- You didn't kill her, did you? - No.
Don't lie to me! - Don't lie to me! Did you kill her? - You're making me fucking nervous.
translation.zh: -不要骗我！你杀了她吗？ -你让我好紧张

translation.en: - Did you kill her? - No! The fucking boss did, or his brother.
translation.zh: -你杀了她吗？ -不！老大下手的 或是他弟弟

translation.en: Who's the boss?
- We never see his face. - You're lying to me.
I'm telling you the truth! Who? You never seen whose face?
translation.zh: -我说的是真的！ -没有见过谁的面？

translation.en: Well, we were in the other room.
And he was yelling at the girl because his nephew got killed and the money got stolen.
translation.zh: 他对那个女孩大吼大叫 因为他侄子被杀 钱被抢走

translation.en: - Wait. Somebody stole what money? - The ransom money at the drop.
- Who stole it? - He said some fucking crooked cop took it.
- Who? - Fuentes.
- Fuentes? - Yeah, that's him.
- Jersey boy? - Yeah.
translation.zh: -你还好吧 新泽西来的？ -还好

translation.en: - This Fuentes guy... - Yeah?
He's a lieutenant for the Anti-Kidnapping Division.
- What'd you do? - Oh, man.
Tell me about the girl. What did you do?
translation.zh: 女孩怎么了 你干了什么事？

translation.en: - I just do what they tell me. - You do what they tell you to do?
translation.zh: -我只是听命行事 -他们叫你做什么？

translation.en: Did you say goodbye to her? Answer. Did you say goodbye to her?
translation.zh: 你有跟她说再见吗？ 说呀 有没有？

translation.en: - No! - You didn't?
translation.zh: -没有！ -现在给你机会 说再见

translation.en: - Here's your chance. Say goodbye. - Oh, shit.
translation.zh: -没有！ -现在给你机会 说再见 -别乱来 -跟她说再见

translation.en: Say goodbye to her. Say goodbye to her.
Motherfucker, let me go!
They threw the little girl against the wall.
She wasn't moving.
They threw her body in the trunk of the car,
translation.zh: 他们将她丢进汽车行李箱里

translation.en: and then they drove away.
Who? Who? Who's they?
The boss's brother.
I recognized his voice.
Okay. Okay.
Now listen to me.
If you tell me where to find the boss,
translation.zh: 你告诉我去哪里找这个老大

translation.en: I'll let you live.
But I don't know.
I'll give you the girl. I'll give you the girl.
What girl?
The girl...
Do you want the girl?
Yes, yes, but what girl? What are you saying?
translation.zh: 要 什么女孩？你在说什么？

translation.en: - The girl. - Here?
You sure?
Show me.
- Guerrero. - Listen, it's me.
Do you know about a young girl being kidnapped recently, about 12 years old?
translation.zh: 最近有没有一桩 12岁女孩被绑架的消息？

translation.en: - Yes, last night. Do you know something? - What's her name?
translation.zh: -有 昨晚的 有什么消息？ -她叫什么名字？

translation.en: Camila. Camila Valencias.
- I got her. - Where are you?
- Creasy, what happened? - It's okay. Sit down, relax.
translation.zh: -克里西 发生了什么事？ -没事 坐下 别紧张

translation.en: She's okay, she's okay.
You got banking connections?
Yes, I have connections.
PIN number's 4747. I wanna find out who's putting money in that account.
translation.zh: 密码4747 查出存款人是谁

translation.en: What do you know about a cop named Fuentes?
translation.zh: 你认识傅恩泰这个条子吗？

translation.en: He's with the Anti-Kidnapping Division. He drove Samuel Ramos to the drop.
translation.zh: -反绑架部门 他送雷墨去付款 -傅恩泰？

translation.en: - Fuentes? - Who is she?
translation.zh: -反绑架部门 他送雷墨去付款 -傅恩泰？ -她是谁？ -待会问她 她会告诉你一切

translation.en: You can ask her later. She'll tell you anything.
translation.zh: -她是谁？ -待会问她 她会告诉你一切

translation.en: What do you know about Fuentes?
Three years ago they caught him with $50,000 and a dead body in the trunk.
translation.zh: 三年前他车载五万现金 和一具尸体被逮到

translation.en: Never charged. The arresting officer couldn't testify because he was dead.
translation.zh: 未起诉 逮捕他的警察暴毙 无法作证

translation.en: Was he La Hermandad?
- You know where he lives? - He lives in a Judicial compound.
He travels by motorcade.
He's better protected than the president of Mexico. He's gonna need it. Can you take care of her?
translation.zh: -保护工作比总统都周到 -他将需要这种保护 她交给你了？

translation.en: - Yes, but how can I find you? - I'll find you.
translation.zh: -好的 我怎么找你？ -我会找你

translation.en: This is my jurisdiction.
I want this man as much as Creasy does.
translation.zh: 我跟克里西一样急着找他

translation.en: He'll deliver more justice in a weekend than ten years of your courts and tribunals.
translation.zh: 他一个周末比法院十年 伸张的正义都多

translation.en: Just stay out of his way. I plan to.
translation.zh: -你不要阻止他 -我不打算阻止他

translation.en: I will even help him, if I can.
translation.zh: 必要的话我甚至会帮他

translation.en: But... I'd like to understand him.
Give me that.
Pita Ramos...
is a number to you.
One more dead, but a number.
translation.zh: 多一个死亡人数 但只是个数字

translation.en: What was she to Creasy, then? She showed him it was all right to live again.
translation.zh: -她对克里西多重要？ -她让他觉得可以再次活着

translation.en: And the kidnappers took that away, huh?
translation.zh: 但绑匪把那个东西抢走了

translation.en: And they're gonna wish they never touched a hair on her head.
translation.zh: 他们会后悔碰她一根寒毛 你知道吗

translation.en: A man can be an artist...
translation.zh: 人在任何领域都可以成为艺术家

translation.en: at anything, food, whatever.
It depends on how good he is at it.
translation.zh: 关键在于专精到什么程度

translation.en: Creasy's art is death.
translation.zh: 克里西的艺术在于夺人性命

translation.en: He's about to paint his masterpiece.
I don't have anything else to say.
I need the accounts linked to this card.
translation.zh: 我需要这张卡的帐户资料 （银行卡） （雷纳罗莎桑切斯）

translation.en: PIN number is 4747.
On one condition.
I'm not here to hurt you.
In the church, they say to forgive.
Forgiveness is between them and God.
translation.zh: 宽恕是他们跟上帝间的事

translation.en: It's my job to arrange the meeting.
translation.zh: 我的工作是安排他们见面

translation.en: Don't move. Put your hands down.
Señor John W. Creasy is under arrest for the murder of two officers of the Judicial Police...
translation.zh: 约翰克里西因谋杀两名 司法警察被捕

translation.en: Can you hear me?
You know where we are?
We're under the bridge
where the deal went bad and the ransom got stolen.
translation.zh: 也就是交易出纰漏 赎金被抢的地点

translation.en: You wanna tell me what happened?
- You've heard of La Hermandad? - Yes, I have.
- You know what it is? - Yes.
I'm the president of La Hermandad.
- You're the president? - Yes. The president?
Look at me.
Oh, you can't. I'm sorry. How's that?
translation.zh: 噢 你看不到 对不起

translation.en: I'll show you what I got here.
See this? This is a charger.
It's used by convicts to hide money and drugs.
They stick it in their body, they tuck it up their rectum. You familiar with that?
translation.zh: 塞进肛门 你很熟悉吧？

translation.en: This... Look at me. Pencil detonator.
translation.zh: 看着我 这是铅笔大小的雷管

translation.en: Timer. Used as a receiver, a transmitter.
translation.zh: 用来收发讯号的计时器

translation.en: C4. Highly explosive.
You put them all together, you got a bomb. Not very sophisticated, but very powerful.
translation.zh: 加在一起就变成炸弹 不复杂但威力强大

translation.en: That's what you have in your ass right now.
Don't move. Don't move. Don't move.
Cheap watch, pager watch,
translation.zh: 廉价手表 做呼叫器

translation.en: used to send a page to the receiver that's up your behind right now.
translation.zh: 给塞在你屁眼里的接收器发信号

translation.en: So... I'm gonna send you a page which you will receive...
translation.zh: 我发出信号到你那儿 你会在…

translation.en: in five minutes.
You got less than five minutes to tell me what went down between your men and the kidnapper.
translation.zh: 现在告诉我你的人 跟绑匪是怎么回事？

translation.en: I have nothing to do with the kidnapper.
- Four minutes and 30 seconds. - Nothing. I don't know him.
You don't know? Four minutes and 25 seconds.
Four minutes and 20 seconds. Are you sure?
Okay.
I got all the time in the world. You don't, but I do.
translation.zh: 我时间多得很 但你不一样

translation.en: - Relax, relax, buddy. - I'm relaxed.
translation.zh: -别冲动 老兄 -我一点都不冲动

translation.en: You got three minutes, 59 seconds.
- I saw the opportunity, and I got lucky. - And?
translation.zh: -我逮住机会 我运气好 -还有呢？

translation.en: And I had my men ready, as we got instructions where to go.
translation.zh: 人手齐备又知道付款指示

translation.en: You had your men ready to steal the drop, ready to kill one of the kidnappers, yeah? You've done this many times.
translation.zh: 准备好黑吃黑 干掉绑匪 你已经驾轻就熟

translation.en: What's going on, guys?
- One of the nephews of the kidnapper. - Bingo, bingo, yeah.
You've done this many times. Many times, yes.
Yeah. You've killed many victims too, haven't you?
translation.zh: 你也杀了不少人 不是吗？

translation.en: - We just make out as best we can. - "As best we could"?
Two minutes, 47 seconds.
Wait a minute.
- Come on, I have a little gift for you. - For me?
- Yeah, come on. - What have you got?
There was no $10 million. There was two and a half in the bags.
translation.zh: 其实没有一千万 袋子里只有二百五十万

translation.en: The ransom was $10 million. They put it in two bags, 5 million in each bag.
translation.zh: 赎金一千万 两袋各五百万

translation.en: Two bags, true, but one has half paper,
translation.zh: 两袋没错 但一袋一半是纸

translation.en: the other only paper.
Maybe your men stole it.
No, no. Whoever did it took it before the exchange.
translation.zh: 在交款之前就被人调包了

translation.en: Okay.
At the Ramos house, before the exchange,
translation.zh: 在雷墨家 交款之前

translation.en: who put the bags into the car?
- Guess what. - What?
Ramos' lawyer. Jordan Kalfus.
translation.zh: 雷墨的绿师 乔登卡富

translation.en: - Jordan Kalfus? - Yeah.
I'm sorry, I'm really sorry for the girl.
translation.zh: 我真的为那个女孩感到难过

translation.en: It was just business, you know?
I'm a professional.
That's what everybody keeps saying: I'm just a professional.
translation.zh: 每个人都这样说 每个人都说“这是我的职业”

translation.en: Everybody keeps saying that to me. I'm just a professional.
translation.zh: 每个人都说“这是我的职业”

translation.en: I'm getting sick and tired of hearing it. Do you understand me?
translation.zh: 我听得很反胃 你懂吗？

translation.en: What are you going to do now?
What am I gonna do? Leave. I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我？走啊 我非走不可

translation.en: Go? Hey, come on, come on. What about me?
What about you? You got 40 seconds.
- Come on. - Thirty-five!
Give me a last wish, please, please.
translation.zh: 拜托让我许最后一个愿望

translation.en: Last wish? I wish...
you had more time.
- Mariana, it's me. - Creasy, where are you?
translation.zh: -玛丽安娜 是我 -克里西 你在哪里？

translation.en: I got something like banking codes from Bankcoast in the Cayman Islands.
translation.zh: 我拿到像是 开曼海岸银行的密码

translation.en: - I need it translated as fast as you can. - Whose account is it?
Jordan Kalfus.
It looks like U.S. deposits and withdrawals. Give me the same thing on Samuel Ramos.
translation.zh: 那是美金存取款记录 也给我山缪雷墨的记录

translation.en: - That's it? - That's it.
Okay.
Creasy.
- Samuel. - Honey?
What's going on?
That's what I wanna know.
translation.zh: 我正想知道发生了什么事

translation.en: What is going on? Sam?
I'm gonna ask your wife a couple of questions, okay? You move...
translation.zh: 我问你太太几个问题 要是你敢动的话

translation.en: You make one sound...
and I'll snatch the life right out of you, you understand?
translation.zh: 我就要你的命 听懂了吗？

translation.en: What happened, Lisa?
Were you in on this, or was it just your husband?
translation.zh: 你参与了吗？ 还是只有你先生？

translation.en: - Am I in on what? - You know what.
Pita's kidnapping, her death. Were you a part of it?
- Pita got killed because the ransom... - Shut up!
translation.zh: -琵塔遇害是因为赎金被抢了 -闭嘴！

translation.en: Yeah, the money was stolen, you're right. The money was stolen by Victor Fuentes.
translation.zh: 被抢 没错 维多傅恩泰干的

translation.en: How much was stolen? Two-point-five million, right?
translation.zh: -但被抢多少？ 二百五十万对吧？ -什么意思？

translation.en: - What are you talking about? - He knows what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: -但被抢多少？ 二百五十万对吧？ -什么意思？ -他知道 维多只拿到二百五十万 -你在说什么？

translation.en: - That's what Victor got. - What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -他知道 维多只拿到二百五十万 -你在说什么？

translation.en: Two-point-five million. Two-point-five million to your lawyer, Jordan Kalfus.
translation.zh: -二百五十万 -二百五十万给你的律师乔登卡富

translation.en: He put it in an account in the Cayman Islands, but he won't get to spend it.
translation.zh: 他存在开曼的帐户但无福消受

translation.en: What happened to the other five, Sam?
That's 2.5, 2.5. What is five from ten? Five. What happened to the other five?
translation.zh: 各拿二百五十万 还有五百万呢？ 还有五百万哪去了？

translation.en: Tell your wife. This is your chance.
translation.zh: 跟你太太说清楚怎么回事

translation.en: - You got a wife, Creasy? - No, I don't.
translation.zh: -你有太太吗 克里西？ -没有

translation.en: You'll never know how hard it is to tell your wife the truth.
translation.zh: 所以你不了解这有多难解释

translation.en: No, you have a wife! You tell me what happened!
translation.zh: 你有个太太！给我解释清楚！

translation.en: - It was in this room that my father... - I don't give a fuck about your father!
translation.zh: -我爸爸曾在这里祷告 -关我屁事！

translation.en: He prayed for his gambling debts and his infidelities to be forgiven.
translation.zh: 我父亲在这儿祷告 他的赌债和不忠得到赦免

translation.en: - Samuel! - What? - I love you! Tell me the truth! - I didn't inherit a kingdom! That's the truth!
translation.zh: -山缪！我爱你！说出真相！ -真相！我继承的不是个王国！

translation.en: You wanna know the truth? I inherited his debt and his mess!
translation.zh: 我继承的是债务和烂摊子！

translation.en: - Tell me what happened to my baby! - I inherited his lawyer!
translation.zh: -我的宝贝到底怎么了？ -我继承了他的律师

translation.en: Say it! Say it! Say it! Say it! Be a fucking man!
Jordan told me she'd sit in a room and watch cartoons all day.
translation.zh: 乔登说她可以整天看电视 看卡通片

translation.en: And she'd eat ice cream.
And we'd have her back in two days. He lied to me!
translation.zh: 两天后就回来 他骗我！

translation.en: That's why he's fucking dead. I did it!
I did it, Lisa!
I agreed to the kidnapping.
I did it for us. For the three of us.
translation.zh: 为了我们 我们一家三口！

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Lisa.
You kill him.
You kill him, or I will.
translation.zh: 杀了他 不然我动手

translation.en: You know how they say a...
bullet always tells the truth.
It never lies.
It didn't work for me, Samuel,
but maybe...
maybe it'll work for you.
I'll pray for you.
This is definitely the address from the ATM card.
translation.zh: 这绝对是银行卡上的地址

translation.en: The PIN number was a great locator.
But there's no one that sounds anything like The Voice.
translation.zh: 但没有一个听起来像“声音”

translation.en: Who's that?
He's the man,
The Voice.
My guys got into the house...
translation.zh: 我的人以注射霍乱疫苗…

translation.en: on the pretext of giving cholera shots.
We had to inject the whole barrio.
translation.zh: 附近居民都打了霍乱疫苗

translation.en: We bugged the house and stole the picture of him.
translation.zh: 在他家装窃听器和针孔录像机

translation.en: Now it's time to pursue him.
We have to put his photo in tomorrow's newspaper.
translation.zh: 将他的照片登在明天的报纸上

translation.en: If you value your life,
you won't publish those photos.
- Mr. Creasy? - Yeah, it's me.
I traced the PIN for you and I have an address. Yeah?
translation.zh: 我追踪密码 查到一个地址

translation.en: The cardholder is Reina Rosas Sanchez, the wife of "The Voice."
translation.zh: 卡主是“声音”的太太 莱娜罗莎桑契斯

translation.en: She lives in Los Arcos, apartment 26D, via Appia.
translation.zh: 住在洛斯亚可 亚皮亚路26D公寓

translation.en: - Good. - And another thing.
In today's paper is a picture of The Voice.
translation.zh: 买份今天的报纸 有“声音”的照片

translation.en: "FEAR HAS A VOICE."
Good. Thank you.
He's in.
What do we do?
Nothing... Nothing.
Out of my house, you son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 滚出去 你这个王八蛋！

translation.en: Stop there!
Get out. The kids out. Now!
translation.zh: 出去 孩子马上出去！

translation.en: Sit down.
Sit down!
Reina Rosas, yes?
Who is this? Who is this?
- Daniel. - Daniel what?
translation.zh: 丹尼尔 哪个丹尼尔？

translation.en: Daniel Rosas Sanchez.
The Voice?
And this is his brother?
translation.zh: 好 这个人是他弟弟？

translation.en: What is his name?
What is his name?
Aurelio.
Aurelio Rosas Sanchez, okay.
And you are Daniel's woman, right?
How do you contact him? How do you contact him?
We page him,
and he calls back on his cellphone.
Call him.
There's no signal in here.
We have to go on the roof.
Let's go outside.
Outside.
They're going to get a call.
translation.zh: 等等 他们马上会接到一个电话

translation.en: Be ready to track him.
If we're lucky he'll lead us to The Voice.
Hola, Daniel. - Señor Creasy. - Yeah.
translation.zh: -你好 丹尼尔 -克里西先生

translation.en: Yeah, I got your family here.
Your brother doesn't look too good.
Yeah, Reina, she's what, about eight months? Yeah?
translation.zh: 莱娜大概有八个月了吧？

translation.en: You wanna negotiate?
The most important thing in life is family. Do you agree?
translation.zh: 人生最重要的东西就是家庭 你同意吗？

translation.en: I agree.
There you are, you have my family.
Well, most of my family.
My wife and I are separated. You know how that is.
translation.zh: 我和太太分居 你知道那种滋味

translation.en: Now, tell me seriously, how much do you want?
Your brother wants to speak to you. Here, hold on.
translation.zh: 你弟弟要跟你说话 稍等

translation.en: What the hell do you want?
Listen to me! Listen!
I'll take your family apart piece by piece. You understand me?
translation.zh: 我要把你家人一个个撕成碎片

translation.en: Piece by piece! Shut up!
translation.zh: 我要把你家人一个个撕成碎片 闭嘴！

translation.en: I don't want your money.
You understand me? You understand me?
I want you!
I'm listening.
I'm listening, Daniel. I'm listening.
translation.zh: 我在听 丹尼尔 我在听

translation.en: All right. I will give you a life for a life.
Whose life? What are you talking about?
Whose life, Daniel? I want you!
I will give you her life. For your life.
And in exchange, I will get my life back.
translation.zh: 然后再用你的命交换我的命

translation.en: - What life? Whose life? - The girl's. Pita's.
translation.zh: -什么？谁的命？ -那个女孩的 琵塔

translation.en: - Pita's dead! - Creasy!
I'm a businessman. A girl dead is worth nothing. She's alive.
translation.zh: 我是生意人 女孩死了一文不值 她还活着

translation.en: All right.
I want proof of life, you hear me? I want proof of life. I want...
translation.zh: 我要她活着的证明 听到没有？ 我要证明

translation.en: I want the name of her bear. What does she call her bear?
You tell her to tell you to tell me what she calls her bear.
translation.zh: 叫她告诉你 你再跟我说 她怎么叫她的小熊

translation.en: Little one...
What do you call your teddy bear?
translation.zh: 你的泰迪熊叫什么名字？

translation.en: Yeah?
Creasy. She calls the bear Creasy Bear.
translation.zh: 克里西 小熊叫做克里西熊

translation.en: Remember...
I will give you her life
for your life
and the life of my brother.
Okay.
Okay.
I give you your brother, you give me the girl.
translation.zh: 你弟弟还你 女孩还我

translation.en: - All right. - Where?
He left the roof. We lost the signal.
translation.zh: 离开屋顶 信号消失

translation.en: We got cut off.
We lost him. We lost him.
Damn.
- Hello? - Lisa, listen to me. Don't hang up.
translation.zh: -喂 -丽莎 听我说 别挂断

translation.en: I think Pita's alive.
I can't take this anymore.
Take the road to Puebla. Get off junction 34, south side.
translation.zh: 往普柏拉 下34号路口南侧

translation.en: I'll meet you there in two hours.
translation.zh: 我们两小时后在那碰面

translation.en: So where is she?
She's right over there. You see those two cars out there?
translation.zh: 那边 看到那两辆车了吗？

translation.en: Pita's kidnapper, Daniel...
translation.zh: 琵塔的绑匪 丹尼尔

translation.en: Here's his brother.
Here.
I'm going up on the bridge to get Pita.
Anything goes wrong, you put it to his head,
translation.zh: 如果有有任何差错 用枪指着他的脑袋

translation.en: you pull the trigger, all right?
You understand?
You don't let him loose
until she's with you, you got it?
translation.zh: 绝不能放开他 知道吗？

translation.en: And you don't wait for me, okay?
- Yeah. - You'll be all right. You okay?
Yeah.
Creasy!
Creasy!
Creasy!
- You all right? - Yeah. They didn't hurt you?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？ 他们没有伤害你？

translation.en: Hi.
All right, your mother's waiting for you. She's at the end the bridge.
- Okay, you go home. - Okay.
- All right. - Where are you going?
I'm going home too.
I'm going to Blue Bayou.
Hey. I got something for you.
translation.zh: 嘿 我有个东西给你

translation.en: I got the last number too.
I love you, Creasy.
And you love me, don't you?
Yes, I do.
Now, come on, Pita, go.
translation.zh: 快走吧 琵塔 走

translation.en: - Go. Run. - Bye.
- Mom! - Baby, come here! It's okay!
- Mom! - Come on.
Okay, I'll let you go now.
Mom!
